properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 9:02AM CST until January 6 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Tombigbee River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Friday, January 3, until Sunday, January 5.
* At 8 AM Wednesday the stage was...9.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 17.0 feet on Saturday, January 4.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage early Friday, January 3,
eventually cresting near 17.0 feet on Saturday, January 4. The
river is forecast to fall below flood stage by Sunday, January 5.
At 17.0 feet, water is flowing over portions of Hood Road and
extensive agricultural flooding is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
